title: [Bug]: Crash when making a screenshot, only when run through walker (application launcher)
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

I use [walker](https://github.com/abenz1267/walker) to launch teams. If I take a screenshot with grimblast, a second after taking the screenshot teams will crash.

### What package are you using?

aur

### Version

2.0.11

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Start teams-for-linux through walker
2. Make a screenshot with grimblast (https://github.com/hyprwm/contrib)
3. Crashes (every time)
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
shouldn't crash
```

### Debug

```markdown
n/a
```

### Additional context

Coredump when running through walker: [coredump-walker.txt](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/19974702/coredump-walker.txt)

Triggering an abort when running from a terminal: [coredump-terminal.txt](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/19974709/coredump-terminal.txt) (to compare the executable, commandline options, control group, etc)
